originalText.text:
Dr. Pesala is a great doctor and his staff is amazing! I always feel comfortable when I’m there as they are all patient, attentive and kind to me. I would recommend anyone to visit them as I have had lingering issues for years and on my for visit to the office Dr. Pesala listened to what I had to say, assessed me and found what my problem was.
Thank you Dr. Pesala truly appreciate!!!

originalText.text: Money hungry fake doctor he is a fraud and scam requires you to see him every month for refills and withholds the prescription until he sees u what a rip off he just wants money to fund his dwindling business no wonder he never has any patients in the lobby plus Camille is the most passive aggressive “nurse” I’ve ever had the misfortune of dealing with I highly do not Recommend this provider seek help anywhere else I’m already switching my primary as soon as I finish this review he’s just terrible and condensing

originalText.text: Great Doctor! Very attentive to my needs and concerns about my health! Always on time, never late. Never had to wait past my appointment time. Office returns calls asap. Camila the doctor's assistant is awesome! She is always a helping hand when scheduling my appointments or getting any documentations based on my health. If you're looking for a great doctor and staff this is the place! I have been with this doctor for 5 years and will not go elsewhere. 100% patient satisfactory!

originalText.text: It was my first time seeing Dr. Pesala and I really enjoyed being his patient.  He was very pleasant, took his time through my exam, and was very thorough.  I could tell that he was trying to make me feel comfortable.  Also there was no wait time, the receptionist was friendly, and all my points were addressed.  The only downfall is they referred me to a different location for blood work (not on site).  I will definitely use him as my PCP from now on.

The only downfall is they referred me to a different location for blood work (not on site).  I will definitely use him as my PCP from now on.

originalText.text: Dr. Pesala is great! There is always little or no wait time, he is always courteous and listens to me carefully before providing treatment. If I need further treatment he has a great roster of specialists that are just as good as he is. He also has really great bedside manner, which helps a lot! Highly recommend him to anybody!
